creator: benoit.wiart@gmail.com
text:
the "use concurrent pool" is too technical and an implementation detail.
the label should mention "parallel downloads"

creator: benoit.wiart@gmail.com
text:
the default number of concurrent connections should be increased to 6.
see http://sgdev-blog.blogspot.fr/2014/01/maximum-concurrent-connection-to-same.html

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
